Ra.One (U)

Movie |

Villain | Superhero

  • Release Date: 26 Oct 2011
  • Genre(s): Adventure, Action, Science Fiction
  • Language(s): हिन्दी
  • Director(s): Anubhav Sinha
  • Cast(s): Shah Rukh Khan, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Arjun Rampal, Tom Wu, Dalip Tahil See all Cast & Crew
  • Duration: 2h 36min
  • Music: Akon ,Resul Pookutty,Shafqat Amanat Ali,Vishal Dadlani,Shekhar Ravjiani Songs List
  • Award(s): Filmfare 2012 (Won)
    Filmfare 2012 (Nominated) Awards List
  • Similar To: Men in Black, Mr. India
  • Story:
    A father trying hard to ‘fit-in’ in his son’s badass world. A son trying hard to ‘dude-up’ his dad from ‘aiiiyyyo’ to ‘Yo!’ And a mother lost in translation between her husband’s ‘ingeva’ and her son’s ‘inn’it!’ While Shekhar was trying every trick in the book to woo his son, get ‘dude-ified’ and ‘up his coolness quotient’ his son had given up on him. Just when the father-son duo hit a deadlock, Shekhar strikes gold when he designs one hell of a game. Finally it all starts falling into place, as the family comes together, only to find themselves in the middle of a crash…not just a hard drive crash but a crash that would drive them to a disaster and make their lives go – KABOOM! All hell breaks loose when – the game that was meant to be played with starts playing them. Ra.one – The next level.
    Full Story
4.7/10

Ra.One - Where to Stream?

Yay! The movie is available for streaming online and you can stream Ra.One movie on Zee5, Eros, Vi Movies and TV. However, you can also buy the movie Ra.One on YouTube, iTunes, Google Play, Apple TV Plus starting from Rs 150. You can also rent the movie Ra.One on YouTube, iTunes, Google Play, Apple TV Plus starting from Rs 120.

Ra.One - IMAGE GALLERY

STORY AND RATINGS

Story
A father trying hard to ‘fit-in’ in his son’s badass world. A son trying hard to ‘dude-up’ his dad from ‘aiiiyyyo’ to ‘Yo!’ And a mother lost in translation between her husband’s ‘ingeva’ and her son’s ‘inn’it!’ While Shekhar was trying every trick in the book to woo his son, get ‘dude-ified’ and ‘up his coolness quotient’ his son had given up on him. Just when the father-son duo hit a deadlock, Shekhar strikes gold when he designs one hell of a game. Finally it all starts falling into place, as the family comes together, only to find themselves in the middle of a crash…not just a hard drive crash but a crash that would drive them to a disaster and make their lives go – KABOOM! All hell breaks loose when – the game that was meant to be played with starts playing them. Ra.one – The next level.

TRIVIA AND POPULAR DIALOGUES

Trivia

Jackie Chan was approached for a role in the film which was finally played by Tom Wu.

While shooting for the film in Mumbai, Russian President Dmitry Medvedev visited Yash Raj Studios, to watch Khan at work.

R&B singer Akon recorded two songs for the film.

The idea of making Ra.One originated while he was watching a commercial on TV six years ago. Sinha said, "The commercial dealt with two kids controlling a human with a remote. It was fascinating, and the visual stayed with me for some time." Sinha wrote a three-page short story based on the commercial, which he felt was good enough to be made into a film.

Amitabh Bachchan did the voice-over for the game intro in the film.

Popular Dialogues

"Shekhar: Burai sang jo mel rachaya, phir kabhi naa chhute uska saaya. Translation: If you join the forces of evil, it's shadow shall never leave you."

"Shekhar: Ladai goliyon se nahin, dil se jeeti jati hain. (Bullets don't win you a battle, your heart does.)"
